entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 2:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 5.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 80.5 km
Humidity: 52 %
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: SW 32 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
